name: affine
description: AFFiNE is a collaborative, privacy-focused workspace that combines note-taking, whiteboarding, and database organization. It offers real-time sync, offline editing, and AI-assisted features, designed to be a self-hosted modern productivity tool.
features: Unified Workspace: Combines note-taking, visual whiteboarding, and databases in one place. Everything you need for knowledge management.
Real-Time Sync: Changes appear instantly across all your devices. Work seamlessly from anywhere.
Offline-First: Continue working without internet, automatic sync when reconnected. Never lose productivity.
AI-Powered: Get writing assistance and intelligent content suggestions. Boost your creativity and efficiency.
Privacy Control: Self-host for complete data ownership or use secure cloud hosting. Your data, your choice.
Rich Editor: Block-based editing with extensive formatting and multimedia support. Create beautiful, structured content.
Native Apps: Desktop applications optimized for Linux, Windows, and macOS. Superior performance on every platform.
Modern Interface: Clean, intuitive design that minimizes distractions. Focus on what matters most.
